p: Our group reported the physical-chemical properties and antibacterial activity of chitosan coating incorporated with Thymus capitatus essential oil (TCEO) against the bacteria involved in the spoilage of tuna and swordfish [ 41]. A commercial TCEO was selected, as it contained reinforced main components and had a high degree of purity, which proved to be an advantage in increasing antimicrobial properties and in decreasing the fungal decay of fruits [ 41].
